extendedInfo.description: Relive the Arrested Development days with the one and only Steve Holt App! Grip your device tight and jerk your arm upwards. Sure to dumbfound (and disappoint, possibly) any sane or normal person. Might accidentally gain you a few friends. Features:- yells "Steve Holt!"- 2 modes of selection: normal and experimental- experimental mode detects upward motion and yells "Steve Holt!" automatically- no adverts.- lightweight

reviews.title: Steve Holt!
reviews.comment: The great thing about this app is that it has absolutely no redeeming benefit to humanity.  It is just genius.  Make sure you try Experimental Mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Steve Holt!
reviews.comment: App does exactly what it should. \"Experimental Mode\" is very reliable, so long as you give your wrist a little flick.  Only complaint is that for some reason it uses a lot of battery. Roughly a half-dozen \"Steve Holts\" brought the app\'s battery use above that of the Android OS after 23 hours. I don\'t know why this app drains so much battery compared to other apps that use the speaker, but it\'s a minor complaint since this isn\'t the type of app you will use frequently.
reviews.author: Thomas M

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Easily one of the most entertaining apps I\'ve ever found. However, sometimes when I go into experimental mode, the sound clip plays too late
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Make an app to stream arrested development episodes from the Internet :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely.
reviews.comment: This application has provided me with hours of entertainment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unbelievable
reviews.comment: Nothing more to be said other then AWESOME.
reviews.author: A Google User
